pr_title: Add development_platform for Unity crash reports

timeline.message:
Add development_platform for Unity crash reports

Crashlytics reports sent via DataTransport erroneously did not set the
development_platform field for Unity apps. This results in incorrect
internal metrics for Unity apps.

timeline.bodyText: For consistency, can we make this final?
timeline.author: mrwillis21

timeline.message: Nit fixing: Made a local variable final.
Added test for developmentPlatform JSON serialization
